system.description:
Required: Superior Benefits in @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.EmwWSYlFjlUSGPLL]{Gadget- Magitech}

You develop a magisphere for each of three spells from among those found in the Elementalist, Entropist, and Spiritist lists; these spells may come from the same list or from different lists (this does not count as “learning” or “knowing” these spells).

You develop a new magisphere upon reaching level 20, and another upon reaching level 40 (the same applies if you already reached those levels).

You may perform the Inventory action and spend 2 Inventory Points to perform the Spell action for free, casting one of the spells you have developed a magisphere for. The spell follows the normal rules (including MP costs and Magic Checks).
